summary: This document appears to be pre-trial preparation notes for a witness, likely a victim or associate, regarding testimony about Jeffrey Epstein's activities at his Palm Beach house. It details statements about massages, sexual acts, financial arrangements for bringing girls, and the identification of other individuals involved.

persons.name: AUSA Deter
persons.context: Appears to be the prosecutor preparing the witness for trial testimony.

connections.description: U took girls to JE's Palm Beach house and described him as a 'pervert' who requested specific sexual acts during massages.
U told IM about the financial arrangement of getting more money for bringing girls to JE's house.
AUSA Deter is preparing witness U for trial testimony.

events.title: Witness Testimony Preparation
events.description: AUSA Deter prepares a witness for trial testimony regarding activities at Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach house.

events.title: Massage and Sexual Acts at PB House
events.description: Witness recalls a woman with a British accent calling about scheduling massages for JE, and another individual stating JE was a 'pervert' who wanted his nipples played with while he masturbated.

events.title: Financial Arrangement for Bringing Girls
events.description: Witness U stated she had to bring other girls to JE's house so she wouldn't have to perform certain acts and would get more money, and that she got more money than the girls she brought.

locations: JE's PB house (Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach house)
keyFacts: A witness (U) recalls taking girls to Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach house alone on multiple occasions.
The witness relayed a statement describing Epstein as a 'fucking pervert' who wanted his nipples played with while he masturbated during massages.
The witness had a financial arrangement where she received more money for bringing other girls to Epstein's house, ostensibly to avoid performing certain acts herself.
The document references exhibits GX-15 and GX 3516-017, which contain the full name of an individual brought to the Palm Beach house.
The notes are subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs, indicating sensitive information.
